title: 12 pt. @ symbol wanted
content:
greetings,   
   
i am looking for a 12pt @ symbol. anyone know of where i could buy one, get one made...?   
   
any help is appreciated.
author: austin

comments.content: Are you talking lead type? If so, I have a box of @s. I'll look for a 12'.
yep, lead type indeed. that would be really great of you!

I will look tonight or tomorrow. Things are in disarray right now, but it shouldn't take long - hope this isn't incredibly time sensitive. You can email me your address, and I'll toss it in the mail.   
   
Cheers.
